title: Purpose of Sketching
text: Sketching helps in quickly iterating through different ideas.

title: Flexibility in Sketching
text: Sketching allows for easy modifications and adjustments.

title: Brainstorming with Sketches
text: Sketches are useful for brainstorming because they don't require perfection.

title: Experimentation through Sketching
text: Sketching provides a platform to experiment with various concepts.

title: Aesthetic Value of Sketches
text: The aesthetic appeal of sketches is not a primary reason for their use in data visualization.
